title: FP&A Manager (Financial Planning & Analysis) at Creative Financial Staffing (Houston, TX)
text:
StartWire Job Description 
This position supports the CFO and other executives with financial analyses required to measure, monitor and manage the companys operations. Highly visible and autonomous role within the organization; actively involved in strategic decisions. The Manager works closely with the CFO and is instrumental in refining, developing and improving the Finance function. Analysis involves both existing business as well as potential acquisition targets. Further, the Manager supports and interacts with all corporate departments as well as the geographic districts regarding financial matters, including analysis of financial reporting, budgeting and forecasting. Primary Accountabilities: 
· Lead analytical studies to support decisions / conclusions on financial performance, customer profitability and sales effectiveness. Calculate return on investments using discounted cash flows. 
· Periodic reporting and ad hoc analyses by geographic district and line of business. Best practice and benchmarking analyses. 
· Create presentations on financial and operational results. 
· Interface with sales managers and prepare sales-related KPI reports to assist in overseeing the companys sales effort. 
· Perform ad-hoc analysis for team members across the organization; utilizing problem-solving and advanced Excel skills. 
· Participate as needed in US Executive team and global management team meetings. 
· Finalize implementation of Host Analytics software to improve financial planning, budgeting and reporting. 
· Assist with compilation and analysis of budgets, forecasts and long-range operating plans. 
· M&A work, including evaluation of potential acquisition targets and deal structuring. 
· Assist field personnel with financial applications, models and procedures.
